Package com.ae2dms.GameMap

Class GameGrid

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.GameMap.GameGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable
public class GameGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable, java.lang.Cloneable

The Class GameGrid is used to load the map into grid. Load the map in a 20 * 20 gridMap, containing some methods that manipulate the gameGrid map.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
2020/11/18-9:48

    • translatePoint

      public static java.awt.Point translatePoint​(java.awt.Point sourceLocation, java.awt.Point delta)
      Translate the point location according to the delta value.

      Get the sourceLocation of the original point, move the original point according to the delta point. e.g., (1,0),(-1,0),(0,1),(0,-1).

      Parameters:
      sourceLocation - The original point position.
      delta - Define how the point should be moved.
      Returns:
      java.awt.Point The point after being moved.

    • putGameObjectAt

      public boolean putGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, int x, int y)
      Set the GameObject type at target point as the gameObject type in parameter.

      If the point is out of map bounds, return false; else, set the GameObject type at target point as the gameObject type in parameter, return true.

      Parameters:
      gameObject - The gameObject type used to set as.
      x - The column number.
      y - The row number.
      Returns:
      boolean Defines whether set successfully or not.
      date
      2020/11/30-16:28

    • isPointOutOfBounds

      private boolean isPointOutOfBounds​(int x, int y)
      Define whether the point is out of map bounds or not.

      If the x/y is less than 0 or greater or equal to COLUMNS/ROWS return true; else return false.

      Parameters:
      x - The x value of point.
      y - The y value of point.
      Returns:
      boolean Defines whether point is out of bounds.
      date
      2020/11/30-16:35
